subject.geographic: Third Street, between Laurel and Jersey, New Orleans, La

mods.abstract: ONE HUNDRED DOLLARS REWARD. Lost or stolen on the 4th inst., a likely yellow girl, named LIZ, aged about 12 years. Had on, said day, a red plaid dres and white apron. The above reward will be given to any one finding and returning her to her on Thurd street, between Laurel and Jersey. o6 1t*
mods.note: Louisiana State University Libraries, Special Collections ( http://www.lib.lsu.edu/special )

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
